ese kele nanwadarum kalathmaka kruthin sandahath, 32 daksha kalawan nipayimatath eewaye ranin ha ridiyen ha lokadayen katayam kirimatath, 33 manik gal kapa eewaye ebbawimatath, liyen katayam wada kirimatath, wenath na na widha kalathmaka kruthin sadimatath ya. 34 un wahanse ohuta da dange gothraye ahisamakge puth oholiyabta da kala shilpinta iganwime waraya dun seka. 35 thawada, un wahanse katayam shilpinge da kala shilpinge da nil pata, dam pata saha thada rathu pata nulin saha sihin wa katina lada hanawalin mal wada damannange da wiyannange da nanwadarum kruthin kirimata hakiyawa owunta danaya kala seka.
